full_summary:
**Request for Proposal (RFP) 408: Financial Audit Generalist**
=============

### Tender Overview

The Office of the Auditor General of Canada (OAG) is seeking proposals for the provision of financial audit services as part of an annual audit of the Jacques Cartier and Champlain Bridges Incorporated (JCCBI). The successful contractor will be responsible for providing two auditors to assist the OAG audit team in conducting the audit work related to the annual financial audit in accordance with Generally Accepted Auditing Standards and OAG audit and documentation standards.

### Background and Requirements

The OAG is conducting an annual financial audit of JCCBI and requires the professional services of two auditors to assist in the audit work. The successful contractor must be an Audit and Related Services Supply Arrangement (SA) Holder who has qualified under Stream 1 - Financial Audit under the SA369 series of SAs. Eligible bidders will have been invited to participate in this RFP.

### Project Details

* **Contract Period:** The proposed contract period will commence on April 29, 2024, and end on June 21, 2024.
* **Security Clearance:** The contractor will require a Reliability Status security clearance.
* **Contract Value:** The contract is expected to be awarded through a competitive process, with the lowest priced proposal being selected.
* **Deliverables:** The contractor will be responsible for delivering audit services in accordance with the OAG's audit and documentation standards.

### Eligibility and Trade Agreements

This tender is open to eligible bidders who have a valid contract with the Canadian government under the Audit and Related Services Supply Arrangement (SA) program. The requirement is subject to the provisions of the following free trade agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada–Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada–Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada–Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada–Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada–Panama Free Trade Agreement, and the Canada–Peru Free Trade Agreement.

### Contracting Authority

The contracting authority for this RFP is Beth Cooper, Office of the Auditor General of Canada. Suppliers should submit their proposals via email to [beth.cooper@oag-bvg.gc.ca](mailto:beth.cooper@oag-bvg.gc.ca) by December 15, 2023, at 14:00:00.
